SELECT t.team_name name,COUNT(*) value from volunteer v INNER JOIN team t on v.team_id=t.id
and left(v.team_id,CHAR_LENGTH(#{ids})) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ids},'%')
GROUP BY v.team_id ORDER BY value desc
